name: Arcadia
description:
Originally released in 1982, Arcadia was a classic top-down shoot-em-up for home computers, including the ZX Spectrum. Now, relive those days in this remastered emulated version.

Gameplay

Survive the waves of aliens, dodging using your Ion Thrust Drive, and fighting back with your dual Plasma Disruptors.


This enhanced version introduces a number of modern features to this retro classic, including:

  • Saving/loading the game at any point
  • Support for most modern game controllers
  • Full control remapping
  • Image scaling and smoothing options
